app_title: eMigrant ‚Äî help with legalization in Poland
start_title: Let's start with a short questionnaire
start_p: Answers will help choose the right path to legalization and create a personal checklist of documents.
disclaimer: Not legal advice. Rules and deadlines change ‚Äî we will indicate the dates of the last check.
q_application_basis: I want to apply for a residence card based on
q_ns_offer: Do you have a job offer?
err_name_latin: First/last name: only Latin characters, minimum 2 characters
err_date_format: Date must be in DD.MM.YYYY format
preview_note: The "Continue" button does not launch PDF/AI. It leads to the main screen with checklist.
translator_drop: Drag file here or click to select
consult_note: Message will be sent to consultant @emigrate_support in Telegram.
consult_topic_ph: For example: card extension, job change
consult_err_topic: Please specify the topic of your request
consult_disclaimer_text: After clicking the button, Telegram will open. Don't forget to press the "SEND" button in Telegram itself to send the message to the consultant!
consult_success_message: Telegram opened! Don't forget to press the "SEND" button in Telegram itself.
path.work_basis: Application for residence card based on work
path.study_basis: Application for residence card based on study
path.ukr_basis: Application for residence card based on UKR status
student_zaswiadczenie_what_text: Certificate from university about admission (o przyjƒôciu) or studies (o studiowaniu) with your data, dates and signature/stamp. This is a mandatory document for applying for a residence card based on studies.
student_zaswiadczenie_req_name_text: Must exactly match the passport (in Latin). Check every letter!
student_zaswiadczenie_req_dates_text: Must specify start and end dates of studies. Minimum 1 year of studies.
student_zaswiadczenie_req_university_tex: Full name of educational institution, address, contact details.
student_zaswiadczenie_req_program_text: Field of study name, form of study (full-time/part-time), level (bachelor/master).
student_zaswiadczenie_req_signature_text: Signature of responsible person and official university stamp are mandatory.
student_zaswiadczenie_req_quality_text: Clear scan or photo, all data readable, document not damaged.
student_zaswiadczenie_how_step1: Contact the dean's office or through your university's USOS system
student_zaswiadczenie_how_step2: Clarify whether you need certificate o przyjƒôciu (about admission) or o studiowaniu (about studies)
student_zaswiadczenie_how_step3: Check the correctness of full name spelling in Latin
student_zaswiadczenie_how_step4: Make sure all necessary dates and data are specified
student_zaswiadczenie_how_step5: Get the certificate with signature and stamp
student_zaswiadczenie_error2: Missing start or end dates of studies
student_zaswiadczenie_error4: Unreadable quality of scan or photo
student_zaswiadczenie_error5: Certificate issued not on official university letterhead
student_zaswiadczenie_ai_description: You can verify this document with AI, and it will show errors or confirm correctness. AI will analyze all requirements and give detailed recommendations.
student_zaswiadczenie_ai_coming_soon: AI verification module will be added in the next version
work_description_text: To apply for residence card based on work, you need to have a valid employment contract that meets all requirements of Polish law.
work_contract_dzielo_note_text: For o dzie≈Ço contract, private medical insurance is mandatory
work_salary_combined: Can combine income from multiple contracts
work_ai_description: Our AI assistant will help verify your employment contract for compliance with residence card application requirements.

uop.title: Umowa o Pracƒô (UoP)
uop.description: Main type of employment contract with full employee rights

zlecenie.title: Umowa Zlecenia (UoZ)
zlecenie.description: Contract of mandate with limited rights

insurance_description_text: To submit documents for residence card, you must have valid medical insurance.
insurance_type_1: Private medical insurance ‚Äî can be purchased from insurance company.
insurance_type_2: Insurance through employer (ZUS) ‚Äî if you work officially.
insurance_zus_title: ZUS US7 certificate for work and study
insurance_zus_description: If you apply for residence card based on work (only Umowa o prace or Umowa o zlecenie) or study, you need ZUS US7 certificate confirming your medical insurance through ZUS.
insurance_zus_steps_title: How to get ZUS US7 certificate through ZUE PUE:
insurance_zus_step_1_title: Step 1: Login to ZUE PUE system
insurance_zus_step_1_text: Go to www.zus.pl and click "ZUE PUE" in the top right corner.
insurance_zus_step_3_text: In main menu find "Services" (Us≈Çugi) section and select "Certificates and documents" (Za≈õwiadczenia i dokumenty).
insurance_zus_step_4_text: Find and select "Za≈õwiadczenie o ubezpieczeniu spo≈Çecznym US7" (Social insurance certificate US7).
insurance_zus_step_5_item1: Purpose of certificate: "wniosek o kartƒô pobytu"
insurance_zus_step_6_text: Check data and submit application. You will receive confirmation with case number (numer sprawy).
insurance_zus_step_7_text: Certificate will be available for download within 7 working days in "My documents" (Moje dokumenty) section.
insurance_zus_important_1: Certificate valid for 30 days from issue date
tax_certificate_description_text: To apply for residence card based on work, you need to get tax clearance certificate from tax office.
tax_certificate_requirement_1: Certificate must be issued by tax office
tax_certificate_requirement_2: Must contain income information for last 12 months
tax_certificate_requirement_4: Validity period: no more than 3 months
tax_certificate_video_title: üìπ Video instruction: How to get certificate for free without visiting tax office
tax_certificate_ai_description: Our AI assistant will help verify your tax certificate for compliance with residence card application requirements. Upload document and get detailed analysis with recommendations.
pit_description_text: To apply for residence card based on work, you need to add your PIT declarations for last 3 years (or maximum available period).
pit_purpose: What PIT declaration is needed for:
pit_purpose_1: Confirmation of income legality in Poland
pit_video_title: üìπ Video instruction: How to submit PIT declaration for free without visiting tax office
pit_upo_description: Besides PIT you need to download UPO for each file ‚Äì this confirms document authenticity.
pit_print_instruction: Just print and attach to case PIT and UPO for last 3 years.
pit_ai_description: Our AI assistant will help verify your PIT declaration for compliance with residence card application requirements. Upload document and get detailed analysis with recommendations.
bank_statement_what_text: Bank statement confirms your financial capacity for studying in Poland. This is a mandatory document for applying for residence card based on studies.
bank_statement_amount_text: 15,150 PLN for 15 months + 200-2500 PLN for return home
bank_statement_req_amount_text: 15,150 PLN for 15 months of study + 200-2500 PLN for tickets home
bank_statement_req_bank_text: Statement from Polish bank (not older than 30 days) or sponsorship from parents
bank_statement_req_period_text: Statement must be issued no more than 30 days before document submission
bank_statement_req_language_text: Statement must be translated to Polish by certified translator
bank_statement_req_quality_text: Clear scan or photo, all data readable, document not damaged
bank_statement_how_step1: Contact Polish bank where you have account
bank_statement_sponsorship_text: If you don't have sufficient amount in account, you can provide parent sponsorship:
bank_statement_sponsor_letter_text: Official letter from parents with commitment to cover study expenses. Letter must be notarized and translated
bank_statement_sponsor_income_text: Parents' income certificate for last 3 months
bank_statement_ai_description: You can verify your documents using our trained AI. AI will analyze all requirements and give detailed recommendations.
bank_statement_ai_coming_soon: AI verification module will be added in next version
student_insurance_what_text: Medical insurance for students is a mandatory requirement for applying for residence card based on studies. Insurance must cover all medical expenses for the application review period.
student_insurance_coverage_text: Doctor, hospitalization, emergency care, transport, repatriation
student_insurance_req_mandatory_text: Mandatory for all students without exception
student_insurance_req_period_text: Must be valid for entire application review period (minimum 1 year)
student_insurance_req_language_text: Policy must be in Polish or with sworn translation
student_insurance_req_quality_text: Clear scan or photo, all data readable, document not damaged
student_insurance_documents_text: Depending on your situation, following insurance options are available:
student_insurance_private_title: üè• Private insurance (PZU, Allianz, AXA/UNIQA, Wiener, Compensa, Signal Iduna):
student_insurance_nfz_title: üèõÔ∏è Voluntary insurance in NFZ (Narodowy Fundusz Zdrowia):
student_insurance_zus_title: üè¢ Insurance through ZUS (Zak≈Çad Ubezpiecze≈Ñ Spo≈Çecznych) ‚Äì if one parent works in Poland or you work:
student_insurance_zus_certificate: System registration certificate (Za≈õwiadczenie o zg≈Çoszeniu do ubezpieczenia zdrowotnego)
student_insurance_how_title: How to get ZUS certificate if you work
student_insurance_zus_step1: Contact your employer with request for ZUS registration
student_insurance_zus_step2: Employer submits ZUS ZUA application within 7 days of work start
student_insurance_zus_step3: After registration get system registration certificate
student_insurance_zus_step4: If through working parent: parent can submit ZUS RCA declaration
student_insurance_zus_step5: Make sure certificate contains all necessary data
student_insurance_ai_description: You can verify your documents using our trained AI. AI will analyze all requirements and give detailed recommendations.
student_insurance_ai_coming_soon: AI verification module will be added in next version
ukr_pesel_what_text: UKR status confirmation is za≈õwiadczenie o PESEL with UKR mark. This is an official document confirming your refugee status in Poland and required for applying for CUKR residence card.
ukr_pesel_highlight_text: UrzƒÖd Gminy / UrzƒÖd Miasta (population registry department)
ukr_pesel_req_type_text: Za≈õwiadczenie o PESEL with UKR mark
ukr_pesel_req_speed_text: Up to 7 days, often same day
ukr_pesel_req_quality_text: Clear scan or photo, all data readable, document not damaged
ukr_pesel_how_text: There are several ways to get UKR PESEL certificate:
ukr_pesel_method2_step1: Login to ePUAP with Profil Zaufany
ukr_pesel_method2_step5: Get certificate by mail or pick up in person
ukr_pesel_documents_text: To get UKR PESEL certificate you need to provide:
ukr_pesel_doc_application_text: Must specify purpose: "for pobytu CUKR card"
ukr_pesel_doc_passport_text: Original or copy of passport (for mail method - copy)
ukr_pesel_doc_receipt_text: State fee 17 z≈Ç (must attach to application)
ukr_pesel_payment_title: How to find account number for payment
ukr_pesel_payment_text: Municipality account number is needed to pay state fee (17 z≈Ç). You can find it several ways:
ukr_pesel_payment_method2_step2: They always publish payment details there
ukr_pesel_payment_method3_step1: At counter - often hangs sign with details
ukr_pesel_payment_method3_step2: At cashier/terminal - can pay on site
ukr_pesel_payment_tip_text: In search engine enter: "op≈Çata skarbowa 17 z≈Ç site:[municipality name].pl" or "BIP [municipality name] op≈Çaty skarbowe"
ukr_pesel_error1: Purpose "for pobytu CUKR card" not specified in application
ukr_pesel_error4: Unreadable quality of scan or photo
ukr_pesel_ai_coming_soon: AI verification module will be added in next version
pesel_ukr_description: Za≈õwiadczenie o nadaniu numeru PESEL UKR
pesel_ukr_description_text: To apply for residence card based on UKR status, you need to get certificate of PESEL UKR number assignment.
pesel_ukr_requirement_1: Certificate must be issued by Office for Foreigners
pesel_ukr_requirement_3: Certificate must be translated to Polish
pesel_ukr_requirement_4: Validity period: no more than 6 months
